idea:
Marine Pro Boxing Promotions is India's fastest growing boxing promotions & management firm established with an aim to change the course of professional boxing.

We are building a battalion of next-generation athletes who will showcase some great fight dramas inside & outside the Ring of professional boxing.

With a team of promoters, athletes & matchmakers who have promoted successful live events in India, we take pride in producing great quality boxing shows & bringing talents from across the globe.

â€‹We have been developing some of the finest boxers in the boxing business across India & other parts of the Asian region. Our team is very much committed to provide the highest level of professional support and services to boxers, including managing & promoting fights, career development, media consultation etc.
name: MARINE PRO BOXING PROMOTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: THE COMPANY SELLS ITS COSMETIC PRODUCTS UNDER THE BRAND NAME HASHTAG STUD. THE COMPANY'S VISION IS TO CREATE AN INTERNATIONAL MEN'S GROOMING BRAND WHICH WILL CATER TO VARIOUS GROOMING REQUIREMENTS OF MALE CUSTOMERS ALL OVER THE WORLD. THE COMPANY ALSO AIMS TO CREATE EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES ALL OVER INDIA. THE COMPANY IS WORKING TOWARDS CREATING A PREMIUM BRAND WHICH WILL BE AVAILABLE TO ITS CUSTOMERS AT AFFORDABLE PRICES. COMPANY'S PRODUCTS ARE PARABEN AND SULPHATE FREE CONTAINING NATURAL INGREDIENTS AND INFUSED WITH ESSENTIAL OILS.
name: FOUR STUDS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
When everything in the world today right from Food, cab, clothes, cars can arrive at the doorstep with just a click on phone or laptop, then why not diesel?

Vital Fuel Logistic Private Limited is an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel for your generator (DG sets) / cars/fleet vehicles etc.) in a safe, reliable, and efficient way. Anyone can place order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to chosen schedule. We are making refueling smarter!

The doorstep diesel delivery solution not only provides convenience to the consumers but also roots out the losses in fuel procurement.
name: VITAL FUEL LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
